name: Advanced Customer Account
author: Noor alam

sections.description:
Advanced Customer Account is an awesome plugin for add new Features in WooCommerce my account page

You can get new options for add new features in customer account page.

If you want to add new custom features in Woocommerce my account page then the plugin is the right choice for you. You can display last few orders in my account dashboard tab. it’s very awesom for user experianc.

Translations

  • English
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Advanced Customer Account plugin!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the advanced-customer-account.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the Xadvanced-customer-account.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Advanced Customer Account.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Unzip the advanced-customer-account.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the advanced-customer-account.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress
    installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Advanced Customer Account.
sections.faq:
Can I add new Features in customer account page

yes, you can add new Features by this plugin

Can I see last few order in account dashboard page

Yes, You can show last 3 orders in account dashboard tab.

Can I use the plugin without woocommece plugin

No, The plugin is addon for woocommece so don’t use without woocommece plugin.
